items.content_html: PopupJs.js - Lightweight JavaScript Popup Library PopupJs.js is a lightweight, standalone JavaScript library for creating customizable popups and modal dialogs. It is designed for ease of use, fast performance, and flexibility without dependencies like jQuery or external frameworks.
